Hello,

Has anyone been successful in logging the test results or writting =
any 
information from tests to log file through log4j ?
The log statements =
in my case get printed on to the console and also 
get written into a txt f=
ile created by the junitreport tag in the 
build.xml. 

The log file does g=
et created but nothing is eventually written into it.

Thanks
Shobhana
